name: Rciela, Wicked of the White Woods
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can send 1 Spell/Trap from your hand or field to the GY; add 1 "White Woods" card or 1 LIGHT Spellcaster monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Rciela, Wicked of the White Woods" once per turn. Illusion and Spellcaster Synchro Monsters you control gain 500 ATK, also they cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
